title: [9Ôºè24] Introduction Session of Hong Kong Science and Technology (HKUST)
content: Introduction Session of Hong Kong Science and Technology Date : September 24, 2009 Time : 15:00-17:00 Venue : Room 101 in Creative Learning B/D(E11) Presented by : Prof.Jang Kyo Kim, Associate Dean of Engineering HKUST Purpose : To introduce to, a new scheme called HK PhD Fellowship scheme promoted by HK Research Grant Council (a HK Government bodies).,This is a prestigious fellowship to PhD students. It will be useful information for final year undergraduates and master's students who are keen to go abroad for further studies
